Battle Cards

Erratic Lightning

  1. Can I put this on an enemy character to lower its defense?
    No. You can put Upgrades on your characters only.
  2. If I play this on a character with 0 defense, and then later something gives it +1 defense, what will its total defense be?
    0. Erratic Lightning won’t drop your character’s defense below 0, but the -1 applies again once your character’s defense is raised.
